questions.question: La estructura del presente simple en Inglés en su forma afirmativa es:

choices.answer: Subject + Verb S.F + Complement
Subject + Auxiliar do/does + Verbo S.F. + Complement
Verb + Subject + Auxiliar do/does +  Complement
Auxiliar do/does + Verb S.F. + Subject +   Complement

questions.question: La estructura del presente simple en Inglés en su forma negativa es:

choices.answer: Subject + Auxiliar have/has + Not + Verb S.F. + Complement
Subject + Auxiliar do/does + Verb S.F. + Complement
Subject + Not + Auxiliar do/does +  Verb S.F. + Complement
Subject + Auxiliar do/does + Not + Verb S.F. + Complement

questions.question: La estructura del presente simple en Inglés en su forma interrogativa es:

choices.answer: Subject + Verb S.F. + Complement
Auxiliar Do/Does + Subject + Verb S.F. + Complement
Auxiliar Do/Does + Subject + Verb S.F. + Complement + ?
Subject + Auxiliar do/does + not + Verb + Complement + ?

questions.question: ¿Cuales auxiliares se utilizan en el presente simple para negar y preguntar?

choices.answer: go/went
do/does
have/has
can/cannot

questions.question: ¿Cual de las siguientes oraciones es correcta?

choices.answer: She has three brothers
She have Three brothers
She has tree brothers
She have tree brothers

questions.question: ¿Cuál de las siguientes oraciones es incorrecta?

choices.answer: Sarha does not like the fish
Cloe doesn´t like the cake
Martin don´t like milk
Martha and Jhon do not like soda

questions.question: Ella se levanta a las 7:00 am.  En Inglés es:

choices.answer: She get up at 7:00 am.
She gets up at 7:00 am.
She is getting up at 7:00 am.
She does not get up at 7:00 am.

questions.question: Los verbos (Forma Completa): correr, estudiar, comer y cocinar, en Inglés son:

choices.answer: to see, to study, to ate, to cook
to run, to study, to eat, to cook
eat, run, study, cook
sees, studies, eats, cooks

questions.question: Los verbos (Forma Simple)en presente : bailar, amar, reparar, y jugar, en Inglés son:

choices.answer: to dance, to love, to fix, to play
dances, loves, fixs, playes
danced, loved, fixed, played
dance, love, fix, play

questions.question: ¿Cuál de las siguientes oraciones es la correcta?

choices.answer: It do not fly over the clouds
It does not flies over the clouds
It do not flies over the clouds
It does not fly over the clouds.
